Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core.management

Interface JGroupsChannelBroadcastGroupControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActiveMQComponentControl, BaseBroadcastGroupControl
    public interface JGroupsChannelBroadcastGroupControl
extends BaseBroadcastGroupControl
    A BroadcastGroupControl is used to manage a broadcast group.
